Exposing

Expose a resource

class MembersController
  expose :members
end

Nest a resource

class PostsController
  expose :posts, :nested => [:member]
end

Limit formats for a resource

class PostsController
  expose :posts, :formats => [:html]
end

Skip some actions

class PostsController
  expose :posts, :only => [:index, :show]
end

class PostsController
  expose :posts, :except => [:destroy, :show]
end
